text: It's not the bat you gotta worry about. She eats fruit.

name: bat_kill_17
text: Hey, ask permission the next time you wanna feed my bat.

name: bat_rival_01
text: Oh, Lina, I was hoping you'd be my backwarmer.
text_simple: oh lina i was hoping youd be my backwarmer

name: bat_rival_02
text: Aw, Queenie, in another life we'd a been soulmates, I just know it!
text_simple: aw queenie in another life wed a been soulmates i just know it

name: bat_rival_03
text: Drow Ranger, don't be a stranger.
text_simple: drow ranger dont be a stranger

name: bat_rival_05
text: I know, Vengeful: Chicks rule. They also die.
text_simple: i know vengeful chicks rule they also die

name: bat_rival_06
text: I gotta say, Enchantress: You are spunky.
text_simple: i gotta say enchantress you are spunky

name: bat_rival_07
text: Spectre, I have no idea what you just said, but I could listen to you all day.
text_simple: spectre i have no idea what you just said but i could listen to you all day

name: bat_rival_08
text: Crystal Maiden, you were a tall glass of ice water.
text_simple: crystal maiden you were a tall glass of ice water

name: bat_rival_09
text: I'm not speakin ill of Lina when her ashes are still warm.
text_simple: im not speakin ill of lina when her ashes are still warm

name: bat_rival_10
text: Damn, Lina, I carried such a torch for ya.
text_simple: damn lina i carried such a torch for ya

name: bat_rival_11
text: Always a pleasure being stalked by the Templar Assassin.
text_simple: always a pleasure being stalked by the templar assassin

name: bat_rival_12
text: Death Prophet, I'm the one your visions been warning you about.
text_simple: death prophet im the one your visions been warning you about

name: bat_rival_13
text: Mirana, I think your ride and mine have a thing for each other.
text_simple: mirana i think your ride and mine have a thing for each other

name: bat_rival_14
text: Broodmother, if you weren't already-ugh, never mind!
text_simple: broodmother if you werent alreadyugh never mind

name: bat_rival_15
text: I wish I could have got a better look at you, Phantom Assassin.
text_simple: i wish i could have got a better look at you phantom assassin

name: bat_rival_16
text: Night Stalker, why have wings if you're not gonna fly.
text_simple: night stalker why have wings if youre not gonna fly

name: bat_rival_17
text: Shoulda warned ya, Storm Spirit. She likes fruit.
text_simple: shoulda warned ya storm spirit she likes fruit

name: bat_rival_18
text: Aw, Pudge, I thought you knew all about choppers.
text_simple: aw pudge i thought you knew all about choppers

name: bat_rival_19
text: Uh, usually Pudge, I like a chopped hog. But you the wrong sort.
text_simple: uh usually pudge i like a chopped hog but you the wrong sort

name: bat_rival_21
text: Hey Void! Have you seen Bat to the Future?
text_simple: hey void have you seen bat to the future

name: bat_rival_22
text: Aw, Viper, and I was gonna take you out for a spin.
text_simple: aw viper and i was gonna take you out for a spin

name: bat_rival_23
text: I rode a dragon once. Really chapped my hide.
text_simple: i rode a dragon once really chapped my hide

name: bat_rival_24
text: Okay, Jakiro, which one of you wants to take me for a ride?
text_simple: okay jakiro which one of you wants to take me for a ride

name: bat_rival_25
text: One time I was riding this dragon when the damn thing turned into a knight!
text_simple: one time i was riding this dragon when the damn thing turned into a knight

text: Thought I could tough it out.
text_simple: thought i could tough it out

text: I'll join you in death, old girl.

name: bat_death_12
text: No such thing as a free ride.

text: Ah huh ah heh ah hooh.

name: bat_respawn_01
text: Light then throw. Light then throw.
text_simple: light then throw light then throw

name: bat_respawn_02
text: Gonna ride this bat outta hell like a bat outta hell!
text_simple: gonna ride this bat outta hell like a bat outta hell

name: bat_respawn_03
text: Nothin like the feel of my old bat between my legs.
text_simple: nothin like the feel of my old bat between my legs

text: Now where'd I put my brainbucket?
text_simple: now whered i put my brainbucket

name: bat_respawn_06
text: Hey, did someone hide my chaps?
text_simple: hey did someone hide my chaps

name: bat_respawn_07
text: Hoo, hit a crosswind back there!
text_simple: hoo hit a crosswind back there

name: bat_respawn_09
text: Me an my hognose, hittin the lanes!
text_simple: me an my hognose hittin the lanes

name: bat_respawn_10

text_simple: time for a little lane rage

name: bat_respawn_13
text: You wanna play rough? All right, we'll play rough.
text_simple: you wanna play rough all right well play rough

name: bat_rare_01
text: I remember when you were barely a rat with wings. Now look atcha!
text_simple: i remember when you were barely a rat with wings now look atcha

text: If you wanna ride fast, you gotta ride alone.
text_simple: if you wanna ride fast you gotta ride alone
